scripts.postinstall: lerna bootstrap --hoist && patch-package && rm packages/mjus/node_modules/@mjus/grpc-protos && cp -r packages/grpc-protos packages/mjus/node_modules/@mjus && rm -rf packages/webpage/node_modules/@mjus/grpc-protos && cp -r packages/grpc-protos packages/webpage/node_modules/@mjus
